altername_name: Work Games: A Real Life Game
name: Work Games
overview: A one to six player party game created by Luciano Merighi and Jörg Rosenstiel of Merifon and published in both Commodore 64 Club #06 [Italian Release], and in Commodore Computer Club Nr.3 [German Release]. A collection of work related mini games to blow off steam after a hard week.
